div.h3: Reviews created for delgadod for sprint Gortahork 5
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-5423: Do locks and commitLocks only when a delete is going to be done.
FAB-5423: Removed lockEntities method from Absence side
FAB-5638: Refactored logic to expose method to apply a work pattern to a work calendar.
FAB-5638: Apply work pattern to work calendar on hitting Next in Intake and Add Time.
FAB-5639: Display only specific absence periods instead of the whole calendar days.
FAB-5795: Paint the ADT fields and also the ADI when the same Absence Reason was selected.
FAB-3618: Removed comments about the popup refactor within the work calendar.
FAB-5928: Display diagnosis in and out the Intake.
FAB-5927: Added diagnosis and health care provider to the leave request.
